title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water. 2. Fry pancetta until crispy. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine with pasta and pancetta.
